#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#define ll long long
using namespace std;
ll data[100005];ll n,c;
bool possible(ll val)
{
    ll i,j,temp=data[0],sum=1;
    for(i=1;i<n;i++)
    {
        if((data[i]-temp)>=val)
        {
            temp=data[i];
            sum++;
        }
        if(sum>=c)
        return true;
    }
    if(sum>=c)
    return true;
    return false;
}
int main()
{
    ll i,j,mid,ans,l,r;
    cin >> n >> c;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    cin >> data[i];
    sort(data,data+n);

    l=0;r=1000000000;
    while(l<=r)
    {
        mid=(l+r)/2;
        if(possible(mid))
        {
            ans=mid;
            l=mid+1;
            continue;
        }
        else
        {
            r=mid-1;
            continue;
        }
    }
    cout << ans << endl;
    return 0;
}
